title: Strengthening Instructional Practice Competencies: STEAM-Based Convergence Project Design—Integration of Science and Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and ability to utilize simple digital tools
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more STEAM project topics by analyzing knowledge graphs across multidisciplinary fields
Learners can design and implement convergent projects to solve scientific problems in a VR simulation environment
Learners can produce a final report that improves project outcomes by 80% or more by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
